mapper.select:
select
from price_business_discount t1 where 1=1 AND t1.enabled = '1' AND id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update price_business_discount set business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, partner_code = #{partnerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_name = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM `price_business_discount` t1 WHERE 1=1 AND t1.enabled = '1' ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
